text: <@U12452RAP> assuming the peer will eventually be brought back online, the client SDK should attempt to reconnect, the peer would continue where it left off as it catches up with state transfer
question is whether the events would be sent in order because the peer is designed to continue to commit blocks as it does the state transfer in parallel
<@U0KQ9QKH6> note that tomorrow’s scrums is moved out by 30min at 10am EST
